text: Jevrem Brković (; 29 December 1933 – 24 January 2021) was a Montenegrin poet, writer, journalist, dissident and historian. Brković was one of the founders and member of Doclean Academy of Sciences and Arts.CANU, clanovi He was born in the Seoca village near Podgorica, Zeta Banate, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. Brković died on 24 January 2021 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Montenegrin writers Category:Yugoslavian poets Category:Yugoslavian journalists Category:Yugoslavian historians
title: Jevrem Brković
